title: Savings
trackMonthlySavings: Track your monthly savings to visualize your progress throughout the year.
autoCalculateDescription: Automatically update savings amount based on income and expenses (Income - Expenses)
disableAutoToEdit: Disable automatic calculation to edit manually
autoCalculatedValue: Value calculated automatically based on income and expenses (Income - Expenses)
noIncomeDataError: No monthly income data available for automatic calculation
detailedBreakdown: Detailed breakdown of your savings in

analysis.title: Savings Analysis
analysis.subtitle: Analyze your savings patterns and track your progress

adjustSavingsDescription: Adjust your savings amount for this month based on your income and expenses
